author: adarocket
title: Monitoring solution for a node
description: Most SPOs use gLiveView to track the node status (requires access to the cmd line) or prometheus/graphana, where is lack of essencial data
solution: We are developing a client/server solution to track key parameters of the node/server and send notifications to a special node operator app
experience: 4 people with strong experience in software development for back/mobile (from 6 to 15 years) and infrastructure, we also manage our own node
